attributes.action: stop Sedgemoor District Council removing Braithwaites beech pool that was a gift to Burnham On Sea in memory of soldiers returning from The 1st World War.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sedgemoor District Council wish to remove the Braithwaite Beech Pool which is a reminder of the brave soldiers who served this country in the first world war.

rejection.details: Plesae contact the Sedgemoor District Council in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
